properties.areaDesc: Mississippi, MO; Fulton, KY; Hickman, KY; Alexander, IL; Carlisle, KY; Ballard, KY; Pulaski, IL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 11:29AM CST until March 1 at 4:17AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri...

Ohio River at Smithland Dam...Paducah...Olmsted Lock and Dam
and Cairo

.The points along the Ohio River between Smithland Dam and Cairo are
remaining at or near crest at this time. Water levels along this
stretch of the Ohio River will fall below flood stage between
February 28th and March 1st.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Ohio River at Cairo.
* until Sunday March 01.
* At 11:00 AM Thursday the stage was 51.4 feet.
* Flood Stage is 40.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is still near crest at this time and is forecast
to fall to minor flood stage on the evening of February 27th. The
river is eventually forecast to fall below flood stage during the
morning of March 1st.
* Impact...At 50.0 Feet...The first gate is closed at Cairo.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
